result.eng: There was hunger in every house at that time.
result.ga: Bhíodh ocras i chuile theach an uair sin
result.orig: Bhíodh ocras i chuile theach an uair sin
result.html: Bhíodh ocras i chuile theach an uair sinThere was hunger in every house at that time.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoḋ ocras i ċuile ṫeaċ an uair sinThere was hunger in every house at that time.

result.eng: He always took the lead when there was a meeting.
result.ga: Bhíodh sé i gcónaí ar thús cadhnaíochta nuair a bhíodh cruinniú ar siúl
result.orig: Bhíodh sé i gcónaí ar thús cadhnaíochta nuair a bhíodh cruinniú ar siúl
result.html: Bhíodh sé i gcónaí ar thús cadhnaíochta nuair a bhíodh cruinniú ar siúlHe always took the lead when there was a meeting.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoḋ sé i gcónaí ar ṫús caḋnaíoċta nuair a ḃíoḋ cruinniú ar siúlHe always took the lead when there was a meeting.

result.eng: They would often be in mortal danger.
result.ga: Bhíodh siad faoi bhagairt an bháis go minic
result.orig: Bhíodh siad faoi bhagairt an bháis go minic
result.html: Bhíodh siad faoi bhagairt an bháis go minicThey would often be in mortal danger.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoḋ siad faoi ḃagairt an ḃáis go minicThey would often be in mortal danger.

result.eng: It overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ga: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.orig: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.html: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ sé cuid ṁaiṫ de na faḋbanna seaċadta agus roċtana a ḃíoḋ ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.

result.eng: They [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.
result.ga: Bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéir
result.orig: Bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéir
result.html: Bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéirThey [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoḋ raon fairsing áḃair faoi ċaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á noċtaḋ faoi aċan rud faoin spéirThey [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.

result.eng: But from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.
result.ga: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontu
result.orig: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontu
result.html: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontuBut from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.
result.ponchtml: Ó am go ċéile áfaċ ḃíoḋ seoid ġrinn tuairimíoċta nó léirṁeas géarċúiseaċ le fáil iontuBut from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.

result.eng: Also, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ga: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.orig: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.html: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁinic fosta gur maslaí ó ḋaoine le hainmneaċa cleite a ḃíoḋ mar ṫoraḋ ar na tuairimí a noċt blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
